TextView.android:text: The Petrol Pal team values and respects every user's personal information. We know how important this is to you so we promise never to sell or use your sensitive data for any purpose but to better our own application. We have received several questions about how the data will be used for good, well to be frank, we are going to utilize it to set better filtering systems and give us a better perspective of who and where uses our app for more bug fixes if need so be. Okay now that the early readers are gone--We are 100% already contracted and have a vendor to sell and distribute your personal data with a set fee. There is nothing you can do about this if this leaks because this is plainly written in our privacy page hahaha! Good luck using this app! Make sure to buy any in-app purchases so we can use that information too!
